description: Try our easy to follow Eggnog Truffle recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Eggnog Truffle Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup slivered almonds, roasted, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Melt white chocolate and butter together.

Stir in cream, almonds, brandy and nutmeg until combined. Refrigerate until mixture is firm enough to roll into balls. Roll mixture into balls, using 1 tablespoon each. Place on foil lined tray and refrigerate until firm.
Melt white chocolate melts and coat balls in chocolate. Place truffles on foil lined tray and refrigerate until set.
Sprinkle with nutmeg or drizzle with melted chocolate to decorate.
